ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Move representation + support redirect
ygData.msgSnippet: Alan, you re looking at an outdated draft. RFC2616 (HTTP/1.1) doesn t define MOVE. But RFC2518 (WebDAV) does. Best regards, Julian

Alan,

you're looking at an outdated draft. RFC2616 (HTTP/1.1) doesn't define 
MOVE. But RFC2518 (WebDAV) does.

Best regards, Julian
